title: Ticket #1166: Add native Linux distro packaging into the build process
description:
• The packaging code is executed at the end of "public" target
  • It will automatically detect platform and only perform built on Redhat and Debian compatible
  • Default parameters are provided by patch files for each platform. It will generate a platform-specific version of condor_config from condor_config.generic
  • VDT's init.d script is used instead of the default one
  • "Release button" script is located at /p/condor/public/html/yum/files/manage_repo.pl.
  • Condor RPM is relocatable
remarks:
2010-Oct-20 15:28:56 by jfrey:
All of this appears to be done. We're distributing native Red Hat and Debian packages.
